§ Code Review

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

A **code review** is a type of [[peer-review]] done by one [[computer-programmer]] to of another computer-programmer's [[source-code]].

The purpose of a **code review** to find any defects (if there are any).

For details on how to perform a **code review** is the **code review guide**:

• [[code-review/guide]]
